要說非對稱pvp DBD可以說是目前最大宗了

但有幾點一直沒有修正好的. 至少從我開始玩到現在快半年的感想

低端殺手常排到紅緞倖存者玩家，更糟一點還是個AT團 (Arranged Team)

如果不是玩強勢殺手(護士怨靈鬼武者 rip佛萊迪)，基本上沒有任何遊戲體驗. 就是一方面被修爆

這歸咎於玩家總基數與排隊機制上的問題

那不如從個倖存者當起吧? 很抱歉，你排了快要20分鐘進去搞不好是一個按鍵精靈掛機殺手

基本上也學不到東西，這是我覺得遊玩體驗上比較嚴重的問題.

遊戲持續有在更新版本倒是領人挺欣慰的. (從三角頭入坑 -> 哭魔 -> 雙子 -> 韓國歐巴)

只希望遊戲能越改越好.而不是一昧的削弱強勢殺手.
This game is great, but the devs don't care about their own game. Play at your own peril.

右も左も分からない初心者様が一桁のキラーに出くわして、秒で試合をリタイアして「なにこのゲームつまんない」と言われないためにも、是非頑張ってください

Only fun when you don't get toxic players. 99% of the time you get them unfortunately (I previously said 50% but that was super wrong)

EDIT (after an +174 hours): Still the same experience. A ton of people who sweat in every match like it's an esports match and every swf (survive with friends) group just aims to bully killer players. Survivors try to justify meta perks being OP. And Killers try to justify camping. I hate that I'm addicted to this awful game. Do not recommend as it will make you hate life more.

EDIT x2 (nearly 400 hours now): nothing's changed except Survs abusing more op perks. Survs are still assholes. And killers are still assholes. And haha I still suck at this game

also people teabag like it's 2010 again :)

Dead by bug, mucho aun por corregir, sin embargo es muy entretenido jugar de superviviente, la tensión que pone el juego es justo lo que buscaba.  En rangos bajos es muy difícil encontrar partida, solo queda armarse de paciencia.

La idea del juego esta bien, pero depende de que no te toque gente con ganas de arruinar la partida, y el juego esta lleno de estos. El mismo equipo del juego dice que el campeo, tuneleo, y el streamsniping, entre otras, son cosas NO REPORTABLES, por lo que básicamente es un juego que premia la antideportividad.

Gratis o en oferta, vale la pena, pero a su precio completo no lo vale porque sus desarrolladores solo le ponen empeño a las cosas que pueden vender como dlc

amazing game, although i highly reccomend waiting on  a sale and getting a dlc character with it because the defaults are awful. that said you also need to be prepared for a massive difficulty spike as you level up because a lot of killers in the game are really busted. despite that the game is incredibly fun and i highly reccomend it with friends, makes for a fun and intense time, especially when you get hooked and everyone is figuring out how to get you off safely while finishing a generator. fun shit


edit: my above statements stand true, it's a wonderful game. my reason for saying no to reccomending it? simple, since i switched to linux i haven't been able to play it, even after valve worked to make it as easy as they could for EAC to be cool with linux they haven't done anything to let me play it again. my time with the game would be in the hundreds of hours if this was fixed but no.  guess checking a few boxes and reuploading the EAC SDK is too much work after they apparently already did it about a week ago. what the hell guys fix this

*UPDATE: WHEN A UPDATE CAUSES THE GAME TO LEGIT REINSTALL ITSELF** Maybe at 100 hours if I were to write a review I would recommend it, but honestly I have such a love hate relationship with this game. Sweaty killers. toxic swf, bugs, trash matchmaking, way too long waiting lobbies for games, and so much more... I feel like after the Spirit the game was just eh. But if you do customs with friends it can be pretty fun, even tho this game pisses me off to the max, IMMA STILL PLAY IT. Don't pay full price, get it on g2a or wait for a sale. But the end of the game, I,m still gonna have a special place for this game in my heart.

Ok so I decided to re-edit this review because dear god, the devs have no idea what they're doing. 

First of all: boons, why did they add boons. I play both sides but mostly survivor and I hate boons, it just feels way to unbalanced to be able to have this thing that can revive you anytime you're near it, and then if it gets snuffed out THE SURVIVOR CAN JUST LIGHT IT AGAIN HOWEVER MANY TIMES THEY WANT. Please add a limit to it, whether it be only one time or two. They recently tried to "fix" it but they fixed the complete wrong part of whats making everyone complain about it.

Second: When I noticed this I at first just thought I was going crazy as I had not heard it was changed. The aim assist thing that happens when you lunge an attack as killer. THERE'S NOT EVEN A SETTING TO TURN IT OFF. I've had multiple times where I was about to hit a survivor and OH NO, THE AIM ASSIST "HELPED" ME BY FORCEFULLY TURNING MY CAMERA INTO A WALL AND CAUSING ME TO MISS. I don't even see the point of adding aim assist in the first point but why on earth would you not add a setting to turn it off?

Third: The new change to wiggling. First they changed the struggle button while on hook which honestly I don't mind, now I don't have to worry about carpal tunnel every time I play survivor. But not everything needs to be changed to skill checks, I personally do not like the fact they changed the wiggle to this instead of spamming A and D, that's just my opinion, and luckily they ACTUALLY gave an option to switch it back. BUT WHY, WHY WOULD THEY ADD GREAT SKILL CHECKS TO IT? If you truly want to play like a "Try-hard" then switch to this setting as it makes it possible to escape a second earlier. Which isn't a lot don't get me wrong, but in this game HALF a second is life or death. But I refuse to use it.

-Also the Boil Over buff, this perk is insane now, what was once a perk almost no one used is now the meta. I don't really know if this is a good thing or not but in maps like RPD in the library, this perk is legitimately game breaking. You can't even bring survivors to a hook because they escape EVERY TIME before you can get to one. So what's the solution? To slug, and then get cursed out in end-game chat.

Fifth: I have no idea what's going on with Dead Hard recently. I'm not sure if it's always been like this but when you're playing killer and chasing behind a survivor and you happen to swing right as they DH and actually hit them while they do it: it doesn't count as a hit. I feel as if it should still count as a hit even if they do DH, otherwise the hit sound still plays, the survivor screams, and yet they are unharmed.

There's also my personal issue with the game failing to be what it wants to be. Or maybe the devs are just really lazy (oh wait, that's it.) but you play as a KILLER hunting down people to murder them, and to hook them alive while they scream. But it's like the game is almost scared of gore and being scary. There's so many mories that just look incredibly janky and weird, like for example Michael Myers, his mori is picking up a survivor by the neck and stabbing his knife into them, but it just looks so weird, (Which this also brings up a issue with the animations being wonky/stiff. And the graphics. Which the devs COULD fix but are too lazy.) the knife *phases* into the survivor and they just wiggle around until death. There's no stab wound, there's a little blood and that's it. 

Okay the game isn't meant to be like the Outlast series or Resident Evil but I feel like it could be so so much better and atmospheric and scary. THE FIRST 2 TAGS ON THE STORE PAGE OF THIS GAME SAYS "Horror. Survival Horror" or whatever. You're a survivor stuck in a endless game of cat and mouse because of the entity, you're forced to attempt to escape while you and you're friends get chased and murdered by a killer. I wish the devs would have this one big update (After fixing everything else.) and just add on to the horror aspect of the game as well as the animations and graphics. 

-Maps need redone, which I know they're doing right now and I'm thankful for it, the graphics look more clean and it does add to the atmosphere and gives you that slight on edge feeling throughout the match, but I feel that the graphics needed to be upgraded in general, it's most likely the lighting that's causing this issue. I have the game set on the ultra setting which is as high as it can go and it's still pretty meh. 

-They should stick with the horror tag and just go with it. Add wounds to the moris so it's not just an object phasing into a model. After hitting a survivor add a corresponding wound to them. Just make it better. And I hope for more killers that go along with the horror tag, Ghostface, Myers, Hag, and even Pig are good examples, Ghosty and Myers have the stalking ability and you can't hear their radius or see their bloodstain, it's so fun getting sneaked up on/sneaking up on someone and surprising them. Hag can set down traps that are pretty much jumpscares, and pig can crouch and lunge towards you without also having a radius and bloodstain. And for killers that do have radius and bloodstain: Doctor does it well, he can mess with you and cause you to hallucinate his image, cause his radius to be heard even tho hes across the map, messes with skillchecks, he's a really cool and unique killer in this aspect and it gives you that anxiety feeling when spastic-ally looking everywhere around you wondering if you're actually being chased by him.

-Models of killers and survivors (AS WELL AS ALL THE SKINS) need updated. I know they are also doing this as well, but I want to add on to this. I think all the killers (that it'd make sense for, because this wouldn't for Michael Myers, Huntress, Pyramid Head, and some others.) Should have voice lines like Pinhead or Trickster. It just add so much to it. Like could you imagine doing a gen and playing against Ghostface, and he unbeknownst to you is peeking from behind a wall, stalking you, and then when the meter fills up and he finally comes out to hit you (The game would see Ghostface stalking someone to a full meter and then when they enter chase with that same person it would cause a voice line to happen.)and he says "Peek-a-boo." or something similar. Dude that'd be so cool. And it'd make it even cooler if each killer had a special voice line only for the survivor(s) that came with them. Like the Nemesis S.T.A.R.S thing when he grabs Leon from a locker, that's super cool in my opinion. 

-I also think that the legendary killer skins should be really unique, I mean come on if you're getting us to pay 15 dollars for a skin it better be amazing. It should have a new unique mori (That still makes sense for the killer.) and new voice lines/sounds, maybe even a different walk animation. They have actually done this with the new Huntress skin (Atleast a new mori and singing she does.) and I hope to see more.

-I hope they fix all the killers and make them balanced and equal, each one is someones favorite and I think they all deserved to be played with the same respect. There's no arguing that some killers *cough cough, NURSE* are way better than others like the Twins. I think they should all be unique in their own way and have strengths and weaknesses but still playable.


If the devs truly put in time and effort into the game and ACTUALLY LISTENED TO WHAT ALL THEIR FANS ARE SAYING, it'd be a pretty good game. 

The game has a really good concept, it could be an amazing game if done correctly, if they just balanced killer and survivor and all the perks, then it'd already be amazing, all the other stuff is just stuff I personally want but have seen many other people also mention. I'm also glad they finally found a way to downsize the dang game because it was taking up way to much space after every update. I hope for them to just work on certain things one at a time and have related updates focusing towards these things. 5/10, Old score 7

Dead By Flashlight como é conhecido por todos, é um game insanamente divertido se Você for um survivor com amigos, se tu for um killer meus pêsames meu chapa, o jogo é insanamente divertido, dá pra perder horas jogando, porém a comunidade desse game parece que veio daqueles filmes pastelão dos anos 70, se tu botar os mano que joga esse jogo numa corrida de fusca tunado com os players de LoL os cara quase ganha, além de que a behavior tá nem ai pra opinião da comunidade, fora isso o jogo é divertido, vale a pena na promoção se tu não for um forever alone
